newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $1.6 bln for Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $1.6 bln for Wednesday.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for Wednesday, May 7 are expected to total $1.6 billion in 28 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $1.2 billion in 11 sales, with a $450 million Puerto Rico Electric Power deal through Bear, Stearns & Co., Inc. topping the list.
An additional three sales totaling $68 million are on the possible calender, meaning underwriters have said they may price the bonds Wednesday depending on market conditions.
